room descriptions.intro_text_short:
You step into a dark environment on a sandy floor. You are completely submerged in water.
To the North you see a dark cave. To the South is the faint gate.

item1.description: string about what this thing is

cave.description: A dark cave. The opening must be at least 15ft in diameter. Maybe something of interest lies within?
